detections.label: suspicious_person
detections.notes: Individual in dark hoodie near VIP entrance. Hand in jacket, face partially covered.

detections.label: rushing_individual
detections.notes: Person sprinting from crowd toward podium steps. Security has not reacted yet.

detections.label: rooftop_figure
detections.notes: Figure lying prone on parking garage roof. Elongated object next to them — could be tripod or rifle.

detections.label: crowd_cluster
detections.notes: Main audience area. ~1500 attendees. Front rows pressing against barricade as speech starts.

detections.label: perimeter_breach
detections.notes: Two people jumped west security fence into restricted zone behind stage.

detections.label: unattended_bag
detections.notes: Black duffel bag on ground near front barricade. No owner visible for 15+ minutes.

detections.label: approaching_vehicle
detections.notes: White van driving slowly on blocked street toward south entrance. No credentials visible.

detections.label: protest_group
detections.notes: Counter-protest group of ~40 people moving from northeast toward main crowd. Chanting, some with sticks.

detections.label: weapon?
detections.notes: Metallic glint at individual's waistband. Low confidence — could be phone or belt buckle.
